| Station Working Requirements                                                                                   |                                                  |                                        |        |

| All trains that serve Twickenham in the 3 hour period after the end of specified events (by SWR Train Planning |                                                  |                                        |        |

| Manager) to be advertised 5 minutes later at destination.                                                      |                                                  |                                        |        |

| Restrictions                                                                                                   |                                                  |                                        |        |

| Pathing time must not be used between Twickenham Junction and Twickenham.                                      |                                                  |                                        |        |
